title: Intro to Backyard Farming
description: Learn how to grow food at home.
body: Start your journey by selecting the right crops for your space and climate.

title: Organic Composting Methods
description: Turn kitchen waste into rich compost.
body: Collect vegetable peels, eggshells, and yard waste in a compost bin.

title: No-Till Farming for Small Farms
description: Preserve soil structure and reduce erosion.
body: Skip the plow and use cover crops to enrich your soil instead.

title: How to Use Cover Crops
description: Cover crops protect and enrich your soil.
body: Legumes and grasses make great cover crops in the off-season.

title: Rainwater Harvesting Basics
description: Collect and reuse water on your farm.
body: Rain barrels and roof catchment systems are low-cost solutions.

title: Starting a Poultry Business
description: Raise chickens for meat or eggs.
body: Housing, feeding, and disease control are critical to your success.

title: Agroforestry for Beginners
body: Intercropping trees helps retain moisture and fix nitrogen.

title: Simple Irrigation Techniques
body: Drip irrigation systems use less water and reduce evaporation.
